attributes.action: Cease the e-petitions team practice of routinely rejecting petitions construed by them to be offensive, intemperate, or provocative
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When many government policies are equally and tantamount to the same without the say of the people.  YOU ARE TRYING TO BE HUMOUROUS, OF COURSE THE E-PETITIONS SERVICE IS UNQUESTIONABLE THE APPROPRIATE CHANNEL.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
